Class MyFileWriter

java.lang.Object
data.MyFileWriter
public class MyFileWriter
extends java.lang.Object
class which contains methods for writing in files and creating the reports

    • generateBill

      method that writes into a file the details of an order
      Parameters:

    • createFile

      public java.lang.String createFile​(java.lang.String orderId, java.lang.String clientId)
      method creates new file with new name of the form "billorderId_clientId.txt"
      Parameters:
      orderId - the id of an order
      clientId - the id of a client
      Returns:
      the created file name

    • timeIntervalReport

      public void timeIntervalReport​(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> result)
      method generates the report for orders placed in a specific time interval(writes them in a file)
      Parameters:
      result - a list of orders parsed as arrays af strings

    • clientsReport

      public void clientsReport​(java.util.List<User> result)
      method generates the report for the clients which have ordered from the restaurants more than x times an order of value grater than y
      Parameters:
      result - a list of users that correspond to the condition for creating this report

    • favouriteProductsReport

      public void favouriteProductsReport​(java.util.List<MenuItem> result)
      method to generate the report of products ordered more than a specific number of time
      Parameters:
      result - a list of MenuItems that correspond to the criteria of generating this report

    • productsInDayReport

      public void productsInDayReport​(java.util.Map<MenuItem,​java.lang.Long> result)
      which will be printed in the report about the products from a specific day and the number of times they were ordered
      Parameters:
      result - a map of MenuItem and Long that contains values that correspond to the criteria of this report
